definition: to assist one's husband and educate the children (idiom)/the traditional roles of a good wife
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: And don't give me any of that nonsense about a woman's place being in the home .
sentences.chinese: 別跟我說那些“女人應該在家相夫教子”的廢話。

sentences.english: Now, she is living a low-keyed life at home supporting her husband and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 甚至是現在低調的相夫教子的生活，都讓人稱羨不已。

sentences.english: The traditional destiny of photograph husband godchild cannot chain this woman flourishingly life.
sentences.chinese: 相夫教子的傳統命運無法鎖住這女子蓬勃的生命。

definition: a good wife and loving mother
(said of sb else's wife) a good wife
to get married and have kids/to start a family
variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
to support a family/to raise a family
